playerActionsDescription: Manage your profile and team membership.
managerActionsDescription: Here are the available actions for team management.
rosterSubmenuDescription: Use the buttons to manage your team's members and data.
friendliesSubmenuDescription: Organize matches, find opponents, and check your confirmed friendlies.
marketSubmenuDescription: Post or manage your team's transfer offer.
errorAlreadyManager: ‚ùå You are already a manager of a team, you cannot register another one.
errorNoLeaguesConfigured: ‚ùå There are no leagues configured by an administrator.
errorAlreadyInTeam: ‚ùå You already belong to the team **{teamName}**.
errorMustBeManagerOrCaptain: ‚ùå You must be a Manager or Captain to use these menus.
errorNoEligibleMembers: No eligible members found to invite.
errorManagerCannotApply: ‚ùå As a Manager, you cannot send applications to other teams.
errorApplicationPending: ‚ùå You already have a pending application.
errorNoRecruitingTeams: There are no teams with open recruitment at the moment.
errorNotInTeamToLeave: ‚ùå You do not belong to a team as a player or captain to leave it.
errorTeamNotFound: ‚ùå Your team could not be found.
errorNoMembersToManage: There are no members in your roster to manage.
errorNotInAnyTeam: ‚ùå You do not belong to any team.
errorOnlyManagersToggleRecruitment: ‚ùå Only managers can change the recruitment status.
errorExistingScheduledPanel: ‚ùå You already have an active scheduled search panel in the {channel} channel. Delete it before creating a new one.
errorScheduledChannelNotSet: ‚ùå Error: The scheduled friendlies channel is not configured.
errorScheduledChannelNotFound: ‚ùå Error: The scheduled friendlies channel was not found.
errorExistingInstantPanel: ‚ùå You already have an active instant search panel in {channel}.
errorInstantChannelNotSet: ‚ùå Error: Instant friendlies channel not configured.
errorInstantChannelNotFound: ‚ùå Error: The instant friendlies channel was not found.
errorNoPanelsToDelete: You don't have any active search panels to delete.
errorNoOfferToManage: ‚ùå Your team has no active transfer offer. You can create one from the transfers menu.
promptSelectLeagueStep1: The first step is to select the league for your team:
selectLeaguePlaceholder: Select the league your team will compete in
askForLogoTitle: ‚úÖ Data saved. Do you want to add a logo to your team?
askForLogoDescription: This step is optional. You can upload a custom logo for your club or use a generic one provided by the community.
requestSentDefaultLogo: ‚úÖ Perfect! Your request has been sent with a default logo. An administrator will review it.
requestSentCustomLogo: ‚úÖ Perfect! Your request has been sent with your custom logo. An administrator will review it.
invitePlayerMenuHeader: Select a player from the menu to send an invitation:
inviteSentFail: ‚ùå Could not send invitation to {playerName}. They may have DMs closed.
updateProfilePrompt: Let's update your profile. Please start by selecting your primary position.
primaryPositionSaved: ‚úÖ Primary position saved. Now, select your secondary position.
applyToTeamMenuHeader: Select the team you want to apply to:
applicationSentSuccess: ‚úÖ Your application to **{teamName}** has been sent.
applicationSentFailManagerDMsClosed: ‚ùå Could not send the application. The team's manager has DMs closed.
manageRosterHeader: Select a member from your team:
friendlyStep1Header: **Step 1/2:** If you want only teams from certain leagues to challenge you, select them from the menu. Otherwise, press continue directly.
leaguesSelectedConfirmation: You have selected the leagues: **{leagues}**. Press continue.
friendlyStep2Header: **Step 2/2:** Select from the menu all the time slots when your team will be looking for a rival.
timeSlotsPlaceholder: Select the time slots you are available
scheduledPanelCreatedSuccess: ‚úÖ Your friendly match search panel has been published in {channel}!
instantPanelCreatedSuccess: ‚úÖ Your instant search panel has been published in {channel}!
panelsDeletedSuccess: ‚úÖ {count} friendly search panel(s) have been successfully deleted.
offerStep1Header: **Step 1 of 2:** Select from the menu all the positions your team needs to fill.
offerPositionsPlaceholder: Select the positions you are looking for
offerRequirementsLabel: Requirements and description of the offer
offerRequirementsPlaceholder: e.g., We are looking for committed players, with a mic, available Mon-Thu from 10 PM to 11 PM CET...
offerPublishedSuccess: ‚úÖ Your team's offer has been successfully {status} in the {channel} channel!
offerStatusRepublished: re-published (the previous message was not found)
manageOfferEmbedDescription: Here is your current offer. You can edit it (replace it with a new one) or delete it.
offerDeletedSuccess: ‚úÖ The transfer offer has been deleted.
welcomeDescription:
To fully participate, you must first complete your player profile.

**Click the button below to start the registration.**
managerGuideTitle: üëë Congratulations, Manager! Your team "{teamName}" has been approved.
managerGuideDescription: Welcome to the community's elite! Here is a detailed guide to your new responsibilities and tools. Your main command center is the team management panel.
managerGuideStep1Value:
Your priority is to build your team. From the `Manage Roster` submenu, you can:
‚Ä¢ **`Invite Player`**: Add members directly to your roster.
‚Ä¢ **`Promote to Captain`**: Delegate responsibilities to trusted players to help with daily management.
managerGuideStep2Value:
Activity is key to success. From the corresponding submenus, you can:
‚Ä¢ **`Manage Friendlies`**: Use `Schedule Search` to announce your availability or `Find Rival (Now)` for an immediate match.
‚Ä¢ **`Manage Transfers`**: Use `Create / Edit Offer` to post that you are looking for players.
managerGuideStep3Value:
‚Ä¢ **`Edit Team Data`**: Keep your team's data updated.
‚Ä¢ **`Open/Close Recruitment`**: Control whether your team accepts applications.
‚Ä¢ **You have full control**: You are ultimately responsible for your team.
